text: Georg Ratzinger PA (15 January 1924 - 1 July 2020) was a German Catholic priest and musician. He was known for his work as the conductor of the Regensburger Domspatzen, the cathedral choir of Regensburg, Germany. He was the elder brother of Benedict XVI, Pope Emeritus. He was born in Bavaria, Germany. Ratzinger died on 1 July 2020 in Regensburg, Germany, aged 96.Papst- Bruder Georg Ratzinger ist tot ==References== ==Other websites== * Ratzinger, Georg, My brother the pope (Ignatius Press 2012) Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German conductors Category:German Roman Catholic priests Category:People from Regensburg
title: Georg Ratzinger
